about_the_game:
NEW MUSICAL EXPERIENCE THAT MAKES YOU FEEL ALIVE

Get ready to immerse yourself into the rhythm of the music. The game uses a combination of advanced AI and motion tracking to power the interactive experience. By engaging your body and senses - slice incoming notes, rotate your arms, and stretch your hands to catch disappearing notes - you will have a new connection with the music you love. Now, you’re the star in an epic music journey that's all your own.

LOOK TO THE STARS

With over 100 songs and a growing library, Starri offers a wide range of genres from rhythm game Indie favorites (such as conflict, c.s.q.n, destr0yer), Global Billboard Top Hits that have over a billion listens (Poker Face, Believer, Chandelier and the like), and many hot hits from the Asian and Mandarin scene (Gira gira, Don't don't). You’ll find your rhythm to the songs that move you, and discover new artists along the way. The game includes 41 songs already. You can also purchase 60+ more songs through IAP.

CATCH THE BEAT IN YOUR OWN WAY

  • Play with a friend together locally to add more fun to the game!
  • Two types of motion experiences - Slash mode challenges you to look ahead and predict your next move, and Catch mode will test your reaction and rhythm on the spot.
  • Daily missions to accomplish goals every day.
  • Achievement system, rating system, and leaderboard keep perfectionists engaged.
  • Skin system allows you to choose your favorite avatar and scene.
  • Calorie system designed for those who love to track their activity.

READY ANYWHERE

To get in the game, simply set up your device so that the built-in camera or webcam is pointed towards you and can see your upper body. Get started today on the device you already have with you. No headsets, goggles, or controllers required. Just play and move your body to the music.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur (version 11) and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or Apple silicons like M1 or above.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a built-in camera or a webcam to support AI detection.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Monterey (version 12) and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or Apple silicons like M1 or above.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a built-in camera or a webcam to support AI detection.

name: Starri

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700H or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a built-in camera or a webcam to support AI detection.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700H or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a built-in camera or a webcam to support AI detection.

reviews:
“Exhilarating.”
Kai Huang — Creator of Guitar Hero

“Super fun!”
りりぃ @ugongon — Dance game world champion

“普通のリズムゲームとは違った没入感を味わえる / It's an immersive experience that normal rhythm games won't have.”
gamepedia
short_description: Starri is a body-controlled rhythm game you can play with just a webcam, no VR required. Feel your heart pumping as you slash or catch the beat, dodge obstacles, and turn the wheel. Engage your body with music from Indie classics, Global Top Hits and Asian lineups.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
